data.actual_result: Your cursor will display the hand icon for a couple frames and then reset to the regular cursor
data.expected_result: Your cursor will show the hand icon meaning that you can click on the user
data.steps_to_repro: - Load up a large server (Usually 10,000 or more) - Scroll to the bottom of the members tab - Hover over a user with your mouse- When you move your mouse, your cursor will alternate from the hand icon to the cursor icon.
